footer.title: Hunting Shooting Range
footer.description: Your premier destination for professional shooting training and practice.

hero.subtitle: Begin your journey with elite training and real-world readiness.

items.name: Ahmed H.
items.text: The instructors are world-class. I've improved my accuracy by 40% since joining. The safety protocols give me peace of mind while training.

items.name: Abeer I.
items.text: As a beginner, I was nervous at first, but the patient instructors and supportive community made me feel welcome. Now I can't imagine my weekends without HSR!

items.name: Omar K.
items.text: Professional training with real-world applications. The facilities are top-notch and the community is incredibly supportive. Highly recommend for all skill levels.

benefits.title: Membership Benefits
benefits.levelOne: Level One: Learn firearm safety, air gun mechanics, and build mid-range marksmanship. 2 months | 2,500 EGP/month. Special: 4,500 EGP instead of 5,000 EGP when you pay for 2 months upfront.
benefits.levelTwo: Level Two: Precision, long-range shooting, and hunting scenarios. 3,500 EGP/month or 6,500 EGP instead of 7,000 EGP.
benefits.certification: Academy certification and access to maintenance, gear discounts, and shooting lanes.
benefits.community: Partner-friendly training, group programs, and a vibrant shooting community.

review.title: Share Your Experience
review.subtitle: Your feedback helps us improve and guides others in their shooting journey.

contact.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help. Reach out to us through any of the following channels.
contact.locationContent: Platinum club, Katameya Residence Compound, Naguib Mahfouz Axis, between gate 5 and 6 of AlNakheel Resort.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Precision is not luck — it's the result of relentless focus.
about.mission1: At our range, precision and professionalism meet passion. We're not just a shooting range — we are a community where beginners become experts and marksmen become masters.
about.mission2: Our mission is to offer top-tier firearms training and recreational shooting in a safe, inclusive, and cutting-edge facility.
about.mission3: Whether you're pursuing sport, self-defense skills, or just an adrenaline-filled hobby, you'll find support, expertise, and camaraderie at every turn.

membership.title: Membership Plans
membership.subtitle: Choose the perfect program to elevate your shooting or hunting skills — whether you're starting out or going pro.
membership.quote: A true marksman masters the wind, not fears it.

children.title: Children's Recreational Course
children.aboutDesc: Our recreational shooting course for children is specially designed to foster joy and excitement while teaching the fundamentals of target shooting in a safe, controlled environment.
children.safetyDesc: All children are constantly supervised by our professional instructors, with mandatory parent presence throughout the sessions. We use appropriate, age-specific equipment to ensure both safety and enjoyment.
benefits: Creates lasting bonds through shared activities
children.quote: This program aims to foster happiness and excitement among children while teaching valuable skills in a safe environment.

shooting.title: Recreational Shooting
features: Price varies based on floor level
Additional 100 EGP for Red Dot Sight

questions.question: What equipment do I need to bring?
questions.answer: All necessary equipment is provided including air guns, targets, and safety gear. You're welcome to bring your own equipment if you prefer, subject to our safety officers' approval.

questions.question: Are there age restrictions?
questions.answer: For main programs, members must preferably be 12 years or older. We offer supervised junior programs for ages 8-14 with parental consent and presence required throughout the sessions.

questions.question: How long are the membership terms?
questions.answer: Our programs run on 3-month cycles, but we offer flexible options for private training and corporate events.

questions.question: Is prior experience required?
questions.answer: No prior experience is necessary. Our 'Skilled Sniper' program is designed specifically for beginners with comprehensive safety training.

questions.question: What are the shooting lane rental options?
questions.answer: You can rent a lane for your personal firearm and ammunition for 30 minutes (500 EGP) or 1 hour (950 EGP, discounted from 1,000 EGP).

questions.question: Do you offer any recreational shooting options?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer spring rifle shooting (15 rounds) ranging from 200-300 EGP based on the floor level. An additional fee of 100 EGP applies for using rifles with Red Dot Sight.
